## ResolveVertexNormalNode class

Vertex normal resolver node

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ResolveVertexNormalNode extends BaseGraphNode 
```
**Extends:** [BaseGraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.basegraphnode.md)

## Remarks

Provides the resolved vertex normal in object space (After applying skinning and morphing)
